sentence.Network_cn: 她直截了当地拒绝了邀请.

list.abs: besides unprofessional , such undiplomatic behavior limits the possibility for future projects and negotiations .除了表现出不专业以外，这种不老练的行为限制了将来项目和谈判的可能性。

us unease with the way the episode is playing with victims' families was highlighted last night when the White House condemned the scenes at Tripoli airport in unusually undiplomatic language .白宫用不同寻常的非外交语言谴责了在的黎波里机场发生的情景，对这一幕可能对受害者家属产生的影响表示担忧。
